General.Name: Majestic Gold Corp.
General.Description: Majestic Gold Corp., a mining company, focuses on exploration, development, and operation of mining properties in China, Australia, and Canada. The company primarily explores for gold ores. Its flagship project is the Songjiagou gold mine located in the Shandong Province of China. Majestic Gold Corp. was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Surrey, Canada.
